TEXT: The applicants , PERSON and PERSON , are NORP nationals and live in GPE , GPE . They are represented before the ORG by PERSON GPE and PERSON , lawyers practising in GPE .
The facts of the case , as submitted by the applicants , may be summarised as follows .

PERSON , the first applicant ’s husband and the second applicant ’s father , was born in DATE in ORG and was working as a decorator in the district of PERSON within the province of GPE in south - east GPE . At TIME on DATE he returned to his house from work to have his lunch . As he entered the garden of his house CARDINAL persons , who had followed him , opened fire and shot him . He died instantly .

Security forces arrived at the scene within TIME but made no attempt to discover the direction in which the perpetrators had fled . Instead , they searched the house of the deceased , ransacking it in the process .

No photographs were taken at the scene of the crime and eye - witnesses were not questioned . Furthermore , no post - mortem examination was carried out on the body . Vital evidence , such as fingerprints or spent cartridges , was not collected .
The applicants unsuccessfully contacted the PERSON public prosecutor on many occasions following the incident and enquired whether the perpetrators had been identified or arrested .
On DATE the applicants , through the assistance of their lawyers , wrote to the PERSON public prosecutor and to the prosecutor at ORG and asked them whether the perpetrators had been arrested yet .
The prosecutor at ORG did not reply to the ORG letter .

The PERSON public prosecutor , who received the ORG letter on DATE , sent the applicants a copy of the decision of non - jurisdiction taken on DATE pursuant to which the investigation file had been sent to ORG . This decision had been taken in DATE on the basis of the public prosecutor ’s belief that PERSON , PERSON , PERSON and PERSON , all suspected members of ORG , were involved in the killing of PERSON . For this reason , the prosecutor declined jurisdiction in favour of ORG which had jurisdiction to investigate the matter .

According to LAW of LAW ( ORG ) any person who intentionally kills another shall be sentenced to a term of imprisonment of DATE . According to LAW , the death penalty may be imposed in cases of , inter alia , premeditated murder . Under LAW , where death results from an act of violence but it was not the intention of the offender to kill his victim , a sentence of CARDINAL years’ imprisonment shall be imposed on the offender . Where death results from an act of carelessness , negligence or inexperience on the part of the offender in breach of a law , orders or regulations , LAW stipulates that the guilty party shall be sentenced to a term of imprisonment of DATE and to a substantial fine .

For all such offences complaints may be lodged , pursuant to Articles CARDINAL and CARDINAL of LAW Muhakemeleri Usulü GPE ) , with the public prosecutor or the local administrative authorities . The public prosecutor and the police have a duty to investigate crimes reported to them , the former deciding whether a prosecution should be initiated , pursuant to LAW . A complainant may appeal against the decision of the public prosecutor not to institute criminal proceedings ( Article CARDINAL ) .
According to LAW , the statutory period during which a public prosecutor is obliged to investigate the crime of murder is DATE .
